1.NPC: (Won Ki is staring into space, thinking about god knows what...)
Hmmm~ (Won is humming to himself while staring closely at a device in his hands)
(Won Ki is… sleeping? On his feet? What the heck…?)
(Won Ki looks like he's playing around with one of the radar devices now… It looks like it was from communications…?)
(Won is humming to himself while playing around with what looks like a filter)
Hmmm… Why the heck did that happen?

2.NPC: Hmm?? Hey! You handled the problem with the ship course earlier, right? Thanks!

4.NPC: It's pretty obvious! You're the only other person who would be able to handle fixing the issue without taking forever and staring at the manual!

6.NPC: Anyways! Thanks for fixing the issue! I'll take my time being more hands off if you're not going to hibernate in your room anymore!

7.Player: Yeah, no problem. It's part of my position in the team anyways.

1.Player: What are you up to Won Ki?

2.NPC: Oh, thanks for handling the Engine Power issue earlier! As for what I'm doing, nothing much, just looking at these wires in this device. They look a bit off so I wanted to replace them.

3.Player: Uh… What? They look perfectly fine to me.

4.NPC: No! Look closely! Don't you see the scratch here? We have to replace the wire!

5.Player: That's… just an indent from the device?

6.NPC: Hmmm… Is it? I'll look over the manual again…

7.Player: ...Just... let me know before you do anything...?

9.Player: (I worry about him sometimes… If anything happens to the ship I'm blaming him… ಠ_ಠ)

1.Player: (I knew he was strange but I've never seen someone actually manage to fall asleep on their feet until now… Well. I guess that's a first. I'll leave him be.)
Hey Won Ki. Did you go by communications today?

2.NPC: Yeah, I remembered seeing this broken radar in communications the other week. Only just remembered today, so I went to grab it before the incident earlier.

3.Player: Huh? Broken? (It looks perfectly fine though...???)

4.NPC: It's not giving us any signals, see?

5.Player: That's… a good thing… It's not supposed to be giving us any signals. We'd be in trouble if it was.

6.NPC: Oh. Really??? Hm… I'll look further into it.

7.Player: Yeah… Uh… Let me know what you do… (I hope he doesn't touch anything… I'll check in with Rachel next…)

1.Player: What are you up to now?

2.NPC: Hmmm? I was just checking out one of the filters from the Oxygen Room.

4.NPC: I thought I smelled something weird. Plus look! This filter doesn't have any holes!

5.Player: ...You do know how small oxygen is... right?

7.Player: ...Then why are you poking holes? The oxygen can go through just fine?

9.Player: Can you put that back where it was then?

11.Player: Yep! I'm sure! Please don't poke holes in them. (Oh my god. I swear he's trolling me)

2.Player: Oh nothing, it was just weird that you fixed the power earlier. I went by the power room myself to do a checkup and it seemed fine before the issues...

4.Player: Oh, I just checked on the power cables. I didn't touch anything really.

1.Player: I remember overhearing you looking for something before I fell asleep last night.

2.NPC: Hmmm…? Oh! For some reason I can't seem to find my personal flashlight. Do you mind finding me a spare one?

3.Player: Did you have it on you the entire time...

5.Player: *sigh* It's fine, I needed to keep one on me anyways.

2.NPC: Oh! I always wear them out of habit! I'll keep them off if you want me to though? (Takes off his sunglasses)

3.Player: ?!??!? Uh... Nope! You can keep them on!

2.NPC: Yeah I'm just bored you know! It's way more fun to joke around!
